item.title: In party's response, Democratic Sen. Slotkin says Trump's tariffs will exacerbate economic woes
item.description: Sen. Elissa Slotkin warned that President Trump could usher the U.S. economy into a recession with his tariffs and other fiscal policies.

item.title: Trump breaks record for length of address to Congress
item.description: President Trump on Tuesday broke the record for the longest address to a joint session of Congress.

item.title: Trump announces arrest of terrorist who killed 13 Americans in Afghanistan withdrawal
item.description: President Trump on Tuesday announced the arrest of the "monster" who orchestrated the bombing that killed 13 American troops at the Kabul airport duri...

item.title: Trump announces White House shipbuilding office
item.description: President Trump announced a new White House office to revive the U.S. shipbuilding industry.

item.title: Trump says American dream 'bigger and better than before'
